values.content:
Extract structured information from this job description. Return ONLY valid JSON with no markdown or explanations.

Job Description:
{{ $json.body.description }}

Extract:
{
  "requiredSkills": ["React", "Node.js", "TypeScript"],
  "niceToHaveSkills": ["Python", "AWS", "Docker"],
  "experienceLevel": "Senior",
  "educationLevel": "Bachelor's",
  "responsibilities": [
    "Develop web applications",
    "Lead technical decisions",
    "Mentor junior developers"
  ],
  "qualifications": [
    "5+ years experience",
    "Strong problem-solving skills",
    "Team collaboration"
  ],
  "workMode": "Remote",
  "salaryRange": "$120k-$150k",
  "benefits": ["Health insurance", "401k", "PTO"],
  "summary": "Senior developer role focusing on React and Node.js development"
}

Rules:
- Extract actual skills mentioned, don't add assumptions
- Use standard experience levels: Entry, Mid-Level, Senior, Lead, Principal
- Use standard education levels: High School, Associate, Bachelor's, Master's, PhD
- Include salary range if mentioned
- List specific responsibilities and qualifications
- Return valid JSON only
